protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Involved in the development of several major noradrenergic neuron populations, including the locus coeruleus. Transcription factor which could determine a neurotransmitter phenotype in vertebrates. Enhances second-messenger-mediated activation of the dopamine beta-hydrolase and c-fos promoters, and of several enhancers including cAMP-response element and serum- response element

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
